body_html:
In case anyone else runs into this, I ended up optimizing Inception using the following command:

python tensorflow/python/tools/optimize_for_inference.py --input /tmp/inception/classify_image_graph_def.pb --output /tmp/inception/classify_image_graph_def_optimized.pb --input_names=DecodeJpeg/contents --output_names=pool_3/_reshape --frozen_graph=True --placeholder_type_enum 7
body_text:
In case anyone else runs into this, I ended up optimizing Inception using the following command:
python tensorflow/python/tools/optimize_for_inference.py --input /tmp/inception/classify_image_graph_def.pb --output /tmp/inception/classify_image_graph_def_optimized.pb --input_names=DecodeJpeg/contents --output_names=pool_3/_reshape --frozen_graph=True --placeholder_type_enum 7
body:
In case anyone else runs into this, I ended up optimizing Inception using the following command:

```
python tensorflow/python/tools/optimize_for_inference.py --input /tmp/inception/classify_image_graph_def.pb --output /tmp/inception/classify_image_graph_def_optimized.pb --input_names=DecodeJpeg/contents --output_names=pool_3/_reshape --frozen_graph=True --placeholder_type_enum 7
```
